abstract: In a statement on Tuesday, producers of the film said they were withdrawing it from the festival – where it was to be shown Thursday – pending a hoped-for resolution of a legal dispute with Ms. Franklin.

headline.main: Aretha Franklin Documentary Will Not Be Shown at Toronto Festival
headline.print_headline: Aretha Franklin Film Pulled From Toronto

snippet: In a statement on Tuesday, producers of the film said they were withdrawing it from the festival – where it was to be shown Thursday – pending a hoped-for resolution of a legal dispute with Ms. Franklin.
